name: Hydrocyclone
overview: Hydrocyclone is extensively used for closed circuit grinding and classification system , thickening, des, dewatering , tailings filling, damming, recovery processes in ferrous, nonferrous metal and nonmetal mine industries.
feature: Easy to disassembly & Easy to maintain
Low investment cost & Taking little space
Simple structure and there is no moving parts
application: Hydrocyclone has wide application in metal ore and nonmetal ore processing plants, such as iron ore dressing, manganese ore beneficiation, coal processing, environmental power and alumina industry.
